==Descriptions==
{{Description|The primitive wandering inhabitants of Teyvat's wildernesses.<br>Hilichurls display a strong sense of adaptability to their surroundings. In icy environments, they come up with ways and means to fashion this hard ice into shields to protect themselves.|[[Archive]]}}
